meta_description: Learn more about Climate Tech Connect, our mission, our team, and how we are driving innovation in climate technology. Join us in making a difference.

hero.title: Establishing Benelux as the Europe's climate tech leader
hero.description:
Our collective climate efforts in the next decades will determine the fate of a large portion of the planet — it's about time we shift our role from nature takers to nature stewards.

That's why we created CTC — we believe that tackling climate change will happen through strong collaborations between climate innovators & change makers.

To bridge the climate finance gap and scale impactful solutions globally, we unite innovations with the resources and partners they need.

block1.title: Who we are
block1.description: A non-profit foundation, Benelux-focused; our community consists of climate tech founders, investors, and talent. We actively seek ways to help foster connections & unlock climate innovation opportunities.

block2.title: Why we do it
block2.description:
Using our network and strategic support, we want to propel growth of the most innovative climate tech Benelux companies, help them secure consistent, sustainable capital, access specialized community & knowledge.

CTC is acting as a missing link - an overlooked role of connector and ecosystem facilitator; having strong connections & direct access to key climate-tech stakeholders, we make it easier for the right people to meet and create opportunities.

We see climate innovation as a call to action we want to help and empower those who actively strive towards building scalable climate solutions for a net-zero world.

Science shows that community and a sense of belonging can boost our cognitive functions & emotional intelligence, and shape us into more empathetic beings; we can use this human programming to collectively expand our climate knowledge and awareness, and ultimately - drive real world change.
